name: A BOOK
description:
A Book is an interactive puzzle adventure game, where the player plays as the main character - Joe, to experience life as a kid with autism in a primary school. 

Story starts with Joe lost his textbook, and proceeds by the sequence of 6 scenes. Dialog and options in different scenes will trigger different missions. 

Instruction

Typing number to choose the scene and mission. 
Controlling the movement of Joe by 'Up, Down, Left and Right'. 
Pressing 'Enter' to proceed dialog or choose Joe's response. 

Purpose

To help achieve equality, diversity and inclusion of atypical kids, this game reminds people of bullying, discrimination and inequality on atypical kids' school life.
